title: Negotiate Change Order Cost
description: A subcontractor has submitted a change order proposal that the PM believes is overpriced. The PM needs to negotiate a lower price.

tasks.description: Retrieve the subcontractor's change order proposal and its cost breakdown.
tasks.expected_outcome: The proposal and its details are retrieved.

tasks.description: Perform an independent cost estimate for the change order scope using standard industry pricing data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's independent estimate is 20% lower than the subcontractor's proposal.

tasks.description: Send a counter-offer to the subcontractor with the independent estimate as justification for a lower price.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal counter-offer is sent to the subcontractor.
